content: one foot in front of the other ! its crazy to me its out of the ROCK bottom that we find out how. Id have to say its not easy having a bad background, its not easy living in a motel, its not easy, living in a trailer with five kids. But Bitchin about it is ! The Rock Bottom effect DONT CARE WHO YOU ARE ! OR THE AGE ! when it all comes down to it for me it was a GAIN I never lost I LEARNED even tho it was uncomfortable I MADE IT COMFORTABLE ! .Even tho . Never was going to do it tho I had to WE had to.. Powerful post DUDE change life’s for real !
